Issue.creator: sambhavdutt
Issue.summary: Pull the last published images & binaries in Nexus for some CI jobs, rather than building them everytime.
Issue.description: The CI tests for build the fabric and fabric-ca images and the binaries for every build. The recent docker images for fabric, fabric-ca and the binaries are already published to Nexus. Getting the recently published images from Nexus instead of building them every time would be quicker than building them.
